synopsis.text: K-Fights, the official dueling system at Daimon High School, is the ultimate platform for resolving disputes and boosting grades. The undisputed champion of these battles is Ryoko Mitsurugi, a skilled kendo practitioner and aspiring samurai. Her unrivaled prowess often interrupts her school life as challengers constantly seek to dethrone her. One day, Ryoko discovers a mysterious pendant that transports her to an alternate dimension, Solvania. Here, she is greeted by a shrine maiden named Reiha who identifies Ryoko as the Demon Lord of Yenen. As Earth faces imminent danger from demon beasts, Ryoko must harness her true powers and battle these creatures to safeguard her world, testing her strength, friendships, and determination as a samurai warrior.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
